long_description: Our Novara Thermal Tech arm warmers add warmth when you need it. They are easy to stash and a lifesaver on rides that start out chilly but end up warm! With 4-way stretch and a supersoft fleecy interior, fabric offers great stretch and insulating properties. Arm warmers with articulated elbows are fitted to move effortlessly with your body without binding or twisting, so you enjoy maximum comfort and mobility. Exposed soft elastic gripper at the top openings help keep warmers comfortably in place without slippage. Novara Thermal Tech arm warmers feature a reflective logo at wrist.
